name: Cosmic Cubes (Cscopetski, EspressoGames, SkoobiDoobiDoo)
description:
Welcome to cosmic dice! Traverse the vastness of space by matching the faces of the dice in this puzzle game. Special Mechanics:
  • Indicators:

Indicators to the side show which face you will end up with, if you move in that direction

  • Door:

 

Open doors by activating buttons or pressure plates
  • Push-able Dice:

  

Black dice that you can push around to active buttons and pressure plates
  • Slider:

  

A slide block, step on it then select a direction to begin sliding in that direction
  • Pressure Plate:

 

Match your top dice face to activate the pressure plate, once you step off it will deactivate
  • Button:

  

Match your top dice face to activate the button, even if you step off it will remain active
